bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with wei ruan 痿軟 , dysfunction with softening. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 quoting Yi xue qi yuan 醫學啟源 : 痿軟實時去 , “The dysfunction with softening will be ended immediately”, writes: 去痿弱 , “It eliminates dysfunction with weakness ”.

a) Alternative Writing 萎弱 , wilting with weakness. Identical with yin wei 陰痿 , dysfunction of the yin [member, i.e. penis]. Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry wu ming mu pi 無名木皮： 主陰腎痿弱，囊下濕癢 , “It controls yin[-member, i.e. penis, and] kidney [i.e. testicles] dysfunction with weakness , and moisture itching below the scrotum”.

b) Identical with xu ruo 虛弱 , depletion weakness. SWBJQYBMJ Fj: 五臟痿 弱，榮衛涸流 , “The five depots have dysfunction with weakness ; camp and guardian [qi] dry up and flow off”. Wei ruo 萎弱 , wilting with weakness [1]

Pathological Condition identical with wei ruo 痿弱 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry a yue hun zi 阿月渾子 quoting HYBC wu ming mu pi 無名木皮：主陰腎痿弱，囊下濕癢 , “It controls dysfunction and weakness of the yin[-member, i.e. penis, and] kidneys”, writes: 陰腎 萎弱，囊下濕癢 , “ Wilting with weakness of the yin[-member, i.e. penis, and] kidneys [i.e. testicles], and moisture itching below the scrotum”.
